mapper.insert: insert into Task (idstory, name, description, due_date, create_date, owner, last_modified_date, last_modified_user) values (#{storyId}, #{name}, #{description}, #{dueDate}, now(), #{owner}, now(), #{lastModifiedUser})
mapper.update: update Task set name = #{name}, description = #{description}, due_date = #{dueDate}, owner = #{owner}, last_modified_date = now(), last_modified_user = #{lastModifiedUser} where idtask = #{id}
